question: What are the recent trends in technology adoption among companies in the manufacturing industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the manufacturing industry and their relevant IT budgets and technological investments.
Gather data on recent technology partnerships and vendor collaborations for these manufacturing companies to analyze their technology adoption strategies.
Investigate emerging technology trends specific to the manufacturing sector from the IndustryITTrend table to correlate them with the technology adoption data of the identified companies.
Compile social media engagements to assess how companies in the manufacturing sector promote their technological advancements.
Analyze hiring trends within these companies to determine what skills they are seeking related to technology adoption in the manufacturing industry.
